powerwalk.model.interact

Interface Interactable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComplexInteractable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Canoe, CharterShip, Door, Elevator, Enemy, Entity, EntranaBoat, FairyRing, GnomeGlider, HotAirBalloon, IcebergBoat, JatizsoBoat, Lodestone, LunarIsleShip, MagicCarpet, Minecart, MiscellaniaShip, MusaPointShip, NeitiznotBoat, Person, PiratesCove, ShiloCart, SpiritTree, Teleportable, TeleportItem.Destination, Transportable, WaterbirthIsle

    public interface Interactable
    Interface specifying Objects in the RSBot environment that can be interacted with.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void interact()
      Interacts with the object using the default action.
      void interact(java.lang.String method)
      Interacts with the object using the action denoted by the given String.

    • Method Detail

      • interact

        void interact()
              throws OutOfReachException
        Interacts with the object using the default action.
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the Interactable could not be reached

      • interact

        void interact(java.lang.String method)
              throws OutOfReachException
        Interacts with the object using the action denoted by the given String. This method may throw an UnsupportedOperationException when the given String does not resemble a valid action
        Parameters:
        method - the method of interaction
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - when the given method is not supported by this object
        OutOfReachException - when the Interactable could not be reached
